status.description: Describe the status of the ACK response. If schema validation passes, status is ACK else it is NACK

signature.description: Hash of previously received request body signed using receiver's signing public key. For example, The ACK/NACK response to a confirm call fired by a BAP must have the BPP's signature containing the hash of the confirm message body. In case the API is being routed by a BG, the BG ack will have the have the BG's signature containing the hash of the message body
